title: Security Alert!
body: Just recently I have been running into a issue were as soon as i log in to league of legends i am bombarded by a security alert message saying "Revocation information for the security certificate for this site is not available. Do you want to proceed?" and i am given the option of yes, no, or view certificate. Any ideas on this?

replies.body:
Hmm, this could be caused by certain security settings that aren't allowing League to make the connections it needs to uninterrupted. I'd recommend working through [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944) to address the common solutions.

Let me know if they caused any change for you.
